meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family with clusters of small white, pink, or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the achilleas bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The achilleas added a pop of color to the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the achilleas, enjoying their nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of blooming achilleas.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the achilleas danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the sunflower family, native to Europe and western Asia.
meanings.sent1: The achilleas genus includes many different species of plants.
meanings.sent2: Farmers in Europe cultivate achilleas for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The achilleas in the botanical garden decided to throw a party for the sunflowers.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of achilleas was as vast as the fields where they grow.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the achilleas filled the air with a sweet fragrance.
